name: HARPOON!!!
description:
This game was made for the "GMTK Game Jam 2019" on the theme "Only One". 

You are trapped in a labyrinth with hostile cube and you only have a HARPOON to defend yourself! Go through wave after wave of enemy with your only weapon and see how long you can survive.

Gameplay

It is a basic top-down shooter, you move with your keyboard and point and shoot with your mouse.  

The subtility is that you have to take the time to pick up your harpoon every time you shoot it. So you better be careful before using it or be ready to run.

Also, be aware that some enemies are particularly good at avoiding your harpoon and defeating them will need some timing.

Technical Issue

There is some trouble with the camera on the WebGL version of the game. In consequence the game is only available on windows right now.  Sorry :'-(
